proposal: Hey Rhyolite community, navigating the fast lanes of layer 2 tech while keeping your transactions secure and swift? 🚀 We admire how you're elevating the blockchain experience. With 49 holders on the ETH network, you're clearly on a solid path. Imagine enhancing this journey with your own DEX or engaging your community further through a decentralized lottery. Let's make blockchain not just about holding, but creating and growing together. 🌱🔄
